title: The DJI Restriction: What’s Happening?
description:
What happens when the world's dominant drone manufacturer gets caught in the crossfire of geopolitics? We're about to find out.
The post The DJI Restriction: What’s Happening? appeared first on Luminous Landscape.
content: The December 23, 2025 deadline is less than three weeks away, and DJI – the company behind roughly 90% of consumer drones worldwide – faces an automatic regulatory ban in the United States. Not becau… [+11539 chars]
